title: What Is Square Enix Announcing? - Kinda Funny Games Daily 03.11.21
description:
GameSpot's Tamoor Hussain joins Tim for another TimTam KFGD! They talk all about Bethesda, Square Enix, Soul Reaver, tiny Nintendos, and more!   

Follow Tamoor: https://twitter.com/TamoorH

00:00:00 - Start
00:01:00 - Housekeeping
Thank you to our Patreon Producers: 
Mick @DaNanoBiologist Abrahamson, Black Jack, Trent Berrie, Black Jack
The Roper Report   -
0003:05: - Resident Evil PSA (luke Plunkett at Kotaku)
00:08:50 - Bethesda Joins Xbox Roundtable Happening Right Now
00:14:50 - I’ve seen a lot of people get excited about the potential of the Bethesda’s
acquisition. I’d like to know why this excites so many people? - Best Friends Q:Ignacio Rojas
00:24:25 - Square Enix Presents Spring 2021
00:25:30 - Tomb Raider, Square Enix says it will have announcements about the “ongoing celebration for the 25th anniversary” of the series. - Jeff Grubb at VentureBeat
00:36:35 - Loop Hero, the Surprisingly Addictive Endless RPG, Sells Half a Million Copies in One Week (Rebekah Valanetine IGN)
00:38:25 - Mortal Kombat movie Rated R according to Exhibitor Relations Co Twitter.
00:40:55 -  Ad  
00:42:00 - The Guinness World Records has certified Gunnar Turnquist's project as the world's smallest Nintendo 64 console. (Jeremy Winslow at Gamespot)
00:46:10 - REQUIRED READING - Star Citizen Developers Fed Up After Being Expected To Work During Devastating Texas Snowstorm (Nathan Grayson at Kotaku)
00:52:00 - Out today
00:54:00 - Squad Up:Mark Freeman: @theindieboy1 on twitter for detailsThe Community Zoom will be Saturday 11am till 4:30pm PST, all welcome always a really fun time! Details on @theindieboy1 in the pinned tweet!
00:55:00 - You‘re Wrong
Tomorrow’s Hosts:Greg and Irrational Passions’ Alex O’Neill
